content: indubitable capelet by debie frable a versatile little capelet knit in the round from the top down the scalloped edge at the top is worked with decreases quick to knit and easy to wear skill level intermediate one size fits most size 1 has a 13 depth size 2 has a 16 depth size 3 has an 18 depth materials 1 2 2 skein s bridle trails dk from serial knitters dyehouse or 250 500 500 yards dk weight yarn 24 circular us size 10 5 needles 60cm size 6 5mm gauge 14 sts x 18 row = 4 x 4 10 cm x 10 cm serial knitters yarn shop 8427 122nd ave ne kirkland wa 98033 425-242-0086 website www serialknitters com email serialknitter@live com all sizes loosely cast on 144 stitches join into the round being careful not to twist place marker to denote beginning of round scalloped neck edge k4 p3tog k5 repeat until 4 sts rem p3tog k1 108 sts k3 p3tog k3 repeat to last 3 sts p3tog 72sts mesh section round 1 yo k2tog repeat to end of round round 2 k to end of round repeat last two rounds for a total of 7 repeats increase rounds all sizes m1 k4 repeat to end of round 90sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch yo k5 repeat to end of round 108 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch yo k6 repeat to end of round 126 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch yo k7 repeat to end of round 144 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch yo k8 repeat to end of round 162 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch sizes 2 & 3 only yo k9 repeat to end of round 180 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch size 3 only yo k10 repeat to end of round 198 sts knit 6 rounds in stockinette stitch mesh section abbreviations round 1 yo k2tog repeat to end of round bobble bind off round 2 k to end of round k knit repeat last two rounds for a total of 7 repeats m1 make one sizes 2 & 3 only p purl repeat last two mesh rounds for an additional 7 re- p3tog purl 3 together peats yo yarn over stretchy bind off k1 yo bobble k1 bobble repeat to end weave ends and block lightly serial knitters yarn shop 8427 122nd ave ne kirkland wa 98033 425-242-0086 website www serialknitters com email serialknitter@live com
